query: SELECT id, chapterNumber, title, pdfStartPage, pdfEndPage, audioUrl IS NOT NULL as has_audio FROM book_chapters ORDER BY chapterNumber
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4S4NaSTm8gULMAn.ab4bddc10a61 --database fsRnWghWhaoD2r3KXXoRti --execute SELECT id, chapterNumber, title, pdfStartPage, pdfEndPage, audioUrl IS NOT NULL as has_audio FROM book_chapters ORDER BY chapterNumber

rows.title: The Divine Gift: The Awesome Power and Terrifying Responsibility of Free Will

The Architect of Destiny: How Your Daily Choices Build Your Life
Your Invictus Moment: The Captain of Your Soul
